text:
When I run ant with the '-projecthelp' argument, I did not see any output. Then 
I checked and found that one of the targets had an attribute named 'desciption' 
(I must have mistyped 'description'). But should'nt this show up as 'Attribute 
not supported' or something along those lines?
I am running ant 1.5.1
creator: vraravam@thoughtworks.com

text: This got fixed prior to 1.5.1 - I see an error msg come up!
creator: vraravam@thoughtworks.com
